title: cant connect to games
body: I was just unable to connect to two games in a row after the first one I joined a custom and it loaded slowly but it worked but I just got a low priority because I was unable to connect for some reason. it has happened to two of my friends as well. Is this happening to anyone else?

replies.body: It sounds to me like you're having a network issue failing to connect to the game server, so it's likely to prompt a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) queue for missing too many games.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and get this fixed.  You're welcome to share this with your friends so that it may help them as well.  Otherwise, they're welcome to reach out to us individually in case their issue might be different.  Hope that helps!
